extends.title: Parent Configuration
extends.description: Identifier of the configuration to inherit from.

project.title: GitHub Project URL
project.description: GitHub repository URL where the grammar files are hosted.

version.title: Grammar Version
version.description: Version identifier for the grammar files, such as a tag or commit hash. Whenever possible, prefer tags to commit hashes.

items.title: Grammar File
items.description: Relative path to a grammar file within the project repository.

files.title: Grammar Files
files.description: List of relative paths to grammar files within the project repository.

anyOf.description: Color for comments, documentation, and similar.

anyOf.title: p0
anyOf.description: Color for keywords, operations, punctuation characters, and similar.

anyOf.title: p1
anyOf.description: Color for variables, identifiers, literals, and similar.

anyOf.title: s0
anyOf.description: Color for string quotes, regexp delimiters, and similar.

anyOf.title: s1
anyOf.description: Color for string content, regexp content, and similar.

colors.title: Scope Colors
colors.description: Scope names mapped to color codes.

additionalProperties.title: Scope Replacement
additionalProperties.description: Pattern replacements for scope name endings during inheritance.

replace.title: Scope Replacements
replace.description: Pattern replacements for scope names endings during inheritance.

skip.title: Skip Tests
skip.description: Whether to skip tests. Consider adding a comment explaining the reason.
